overview: Piper was dared to walk into Erik's classroom and strip in front of him. When she tells him that she hasn't had any sexual experiences, he is quick to take the reins. Romeo is in detention for something that Morgan did. He wants her to confess to her crimes, but she has a way of convincing him to take the fall for her. Sara decides to help Manuel out after class to get some extra credit. Rebel sneaks into Tommy's classroom to steal some tests. Tommy unexpectedly walks in, and Rebel has to hide while Tommy starts having phone sex with his wife. She gets so turned on she has to help him out.
title: Corrupt Schoolgirls 11
